nodes.text: Sabaoth Squadron was a mercenary band of starfighter pilots with their own starships. During the Separatist Crisis, the squadron worked for the Confederacy of Independent Systems and were instrumental in early Confederacy efforts leading up to the First Battle of Geonosis, which they participated in, and the start of the Clone Wars.

Sabaoth Squadron was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars roleplaying products. They were originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they first appeared in the 2002 video game Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter.
